greeting: Hi there! How can I assist you today?
symptoms: Thank you for sharing. Based on your symptoms, it's recommended to consult a healthcare professional.
diagnosis: Without more information, it's hard to say. It's best to consult a healthcare professional for an accurate diagnosis.
treatment: Treatment for [condition] varies depending on the severity and individual circumstances. It's recommended to consult a doctor for personalized advice.
medication: I'm not a doctor, but I can provide general information. It's crucial to consult a healthcare professional for medication advice tailored to your specific condition.
appointment: You can schedule an appointment by calling our clinic at [phone number] or using our online booking system on our website.
